5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

default-port-setter

Function

Summary

Sets the default port.

Signature

default-port-setter port => port

Arguments

port
An instance of type <port>. Default value: #f.

Values

port
An instance of type <port>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Sets the default port.

See also

default-port, page 241

destroy-port, page 242

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
